entities.description: The month in which the respondent last used smokeless tobacco.
Recode values and frequencies for the month of last smokeless tobacco use.
The age at which the respondent last smoked a cigar or cigarillo.
Recode values and frequencies for the last age smoked a cigar or cigarillo.
The year in which the respondent last used a cigar or cigarillo.
Recode values and frequencies for the year of last cigar or cigarillo use.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the month in which the respondent last used smokeless tobacco.
Indicates the recode values and frequencies for the month of last smokeless tobacco use.
Relates the survey to the age at which the respondent last smoked a cigar or cigarillo.
Indicates the recode values and frequencies for the last age smoked a cigar or cigarillo.
Relates the survey to the year in which the respondent last used a cigar or cigarillo.
Indicates the recode values and frequencies for the year of last cigar or cigarillo use.
